casebody.data:
BYNUM
v.
PROGRESSIVE UNIVERSAL INSURANCE 440P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Waddell Bynum, for Bynum, Waddell.

*251The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of December 2018 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
